bsb.content: And God saw that the light was good, and He separated the light from the darkness.

macula.content: וַיַּ֧רְא  אֱלֹהִ֛ים  אֶת־ הָא֖וֹר  כִּי־ ט֑וֹב  וַיַּבְדֵּ֣ל  אֱלֹהִ֔ים  בֵּ֥ין  הָא֖וֹר  וּבֵ֥ין  הַחֹֽשֶׁךְ׃

target.content: God i lukim lait i gutpela, na em i amamas. Na em i brukim tudak na tulait.
